    Codename: ZEBRA

    I’m currently involved in a particularly challenging prepress job for a particularly prestigious publishing house, facing an astonishingly close deadline (kind of: has to be printed… yesterday). The good part is that I’ve managed to gather around it some of my best friends – who, by chance, are among the most talented retouchers in the country. I promise, if we’ll survive, I’ll tell you the whole story. In the meantime let me introduce you codename ZEBRA project’s team: MO, MD, TF and yours truly, aka the NWA (no weekend allowed) guys.
